title: Display order details view

requirements.text: Add a user-facing order details page that displays comprehensive information for a single order including order ID, date, status, shipping information (name, email, address, city, postal code, country), and all ordered items with product names, quantities, individual prices, and total order amount
acceptanceCriteria: Order details page is accessible from the order confirmation page and product catalog
Page displays all order information including shipping details and itemized products
Design follows the existing OM FANCY blue-cyan gradient theme with Space Grotesk typography
Order total is calculated and displayed correctly

requirements.text: Add navigation from OrderConfirmation page to the new order details view, allowing users to view their completed order
acceptanceCriteria: Link or button on order confirmation page navigates to order details

requirements.text: Extend the existing admin orders page (AdminOrders.tsx) to allow clicking on individual orders to view full order details in an expanded view or modal
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can click on any order in the list to view detailed information
Details view shows the same comprehensive order information as the user-facing page
UI clearly indicates which orders are clickable

constraints: Do not modify the backend order schema or API
Maintain consistency with existing OM FANCY blue-cyan gradient design theme
Use Space Grotesk typography as established in the current design
nonGoals: Modifying order status or allowing order updates
Adding order search or filtering functionality
